sports reporter

Former OU guard Trae Young plays for the Atlanta Hawks in their game against the OKC Thunder Nov PERIOD   PERIOD

Trae Young made the most of his NBA playoff debut PERIOD

In a  victory over the New York Knicks on Sunday theformer Sooner and current Atlanta Hawk guard finished with32 points  assists and seven rebounds PERIOD He also hit a gamewinning floater with . seconds to spare PERIOD

Per ESPN Young is now the second player in NBA history to record at least  points  assists and five rebounds in a playoff debut joining LeBron James PERIOD

Heres how Twitter reacted to Youngs performance

ICE TRAE  pic.twitter.comaP37k0ER5a

Trae Young after hitting the game winner in Madison Square GardenIts quiet as fck in here.pic.twitter.comWznqFdII2Y

How about this one Trae Young is the first player to have  points and  assists in his playoff debut since Derrick Rose in  pic.twitter.comoLVRgYdb3K

What an amazing play by the ex OUMBBall superstar TheTraeYoung .Young only  in his first NBA playoff game had   assists  PERIOD Trae was the Star of Stars  Hawks  over nyknicks Jimmy V in Hoops Heaven must be Proud seeing his ex PG NATE McMillan doing a fab job  PERIOD

httpst.cokxrHlhXyyp pic.twitter.complcq7aFnJL

Trae Young walking around New York tomorrow pic.twitter.coml6g9eqg20Y

Trae Young Reggie Miller vs Knicks  pic.twitter.comLQxcT0XbXg

Sundays game featured  fans inside Madison Square Garden the largest indoor gathering held in New York since the start of the COVID19 pandemic PERIOD The 75percentfilled arena was loud and animated throughout the entire game becoming hostile against the Hawks and Young PERIOD

Garden crown chants f trae young NBAPlayoffs pic.twitter.com56YxubNkT3

its quiet as fuck in here lol trae young is already an excellent playoff villain httpst.coSWRqW6mW7G

  Trae Young pic.twitter.comSAu7yOZHV4

Former Sooners Kyler Murray and Buddy Hield were impressed with Youngs performance PERIOD

GAME  TheTraeYoung

Trae

Game two will be held at  p.m PERIOD on May  as the Hawks try to gain a  series lead on the road before heading back to Atlanta for a pair of home games PERIOD
